NPC.name: gator
NPC.description: Its bulk moves with terrible speed and dreadful purpose. The thrashing of its tail stirs the muck and smashes aside the reeds, across its back run scales like a raiment of interlocking shields. At the prow its malevolent eyes gaze from atop a great and mighty maw that menaces with a legion of teeth martial'd into uneven rows. This thing is a primeval terror, and no doubt you now have its attention.
